properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A stunning five bedroom detached Victorian villa located in the heart of Camden. This expansive property features high ceilings, original fireplaces, and a large south-facing garden.
The ground floor offers a grand entrance hall leading to three reception rooms and a bespoke kitchen with granite countertops. Upstairs, the master suite includes a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite bathroom. Perfect for a growing family looking for luxury living near Regent's Park.

A perfect starter home or investment opportunity. This bright and airy one-bedroom apartment is situated on the second floor of a secure purpose-built block.
Conveniently located just minutes from Bromley South station, providing fast access to London Victoria. The property features a spacious living area, a separate modern kitchen, and allocated parking. Low service charges and long lease.

Charming four-bedroom terrace house in the sought-after area of Hampstead. This property requires some modernisation but offers huge potential to extend (STPP).
Features include two reception rooms, a galley kitchen, and a 40ft rear garden. Walking distance to the Heath and local amenities. An ideal project for those looking to put their own stamp on a character property.

Luxury three-bedroom penthouse apartment offering panoramic views over the city. This contemporary living space features an open-plan design with floor-to-ceiling windows and a wrap-around balcony.
The state-of-the-art kitchen includes Miele appliances and a wine cooler. Residents also have access to a private gym and 24-hour concierge service. Underground parking for two cars included.

A delightful two-bedroom cottage situated in a quiet cul-de-sac. This property blends period charm with modern comforts.
The ground floor features a cozy living room with a wood-burning stove and a newly renovated kitchen/diner leading out to a patio garden. Upstairs, there are two double bedrooms and a modern family bathroom. Close to excellent local schools and transport links.
